analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
kilesa duka ādi sa ni dassana ttika

original: Nokilesaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no kilesam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi
